ProjectRoot.TagLine: A member of the Fubu family of projects
ProjectRoot.Name: FubuMVC

PublishedNuget.Name: FubuMVC.Katana
PublishedNuget.Description: Run FubuMVC applications using Katana and OWIN

PublishedNuget.Description: Run FubuMVC applications using the Web API Self Hosting alternative
